summary: This bill, the Travel Trailer and Camper Tax Parity Act, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to include financing for trailers and campers in floor plan financing. This means that businesses that finance the purchase of these recreational vehicles can deduct the interest paid on their financing arrangements. The bill aims to level the playing field for trailer and camper businesses and is effective for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
